text: God ne binɨb okok kɨlop pel tap yɨŋ ñek, wog kɨli okok yɨbal. Ne kɨlop pel tap mɨdup ñek, ñɨbal. Anɨb ak tek nep, God nɨbop tap kuŋay ñek, nɨbi tap okok mɨdupsek mɨdɨl, binɨb tap ma yenɨgab okok kɨlop abe ñɨnɨmɨb tek lɨnɨgab. Pen nɨbi gɨtep gɨpɨm ak, tap awl yɨbɨl yenɨgab, bɨ tap yɨŋ yɨmek wog day ne okok tap kuŋay yɨbɨl jakɨnɨgab tek.
